'''''Force Field Erosion''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to use [[Elemental Reactions]] to destroy the barrier created by the [[Electro Hypostasis]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* This attack is usually performed only when the player takes too long to defeat the Electro Hypostasis.
